title: Artist Profile: Yussef Hu
body:
Situated in a room looking like something out of an episode of Dexter.

**Yuseff Hu,** tired and probably nauseous, staggers round the room full of nervously laughing spectators, preparing for each stage of his performance, **_Resting on a sharp point_**_.  2013_

The task executed is to spear what looks like massive carcass sacks filled with balloons pumped full of ketchup, mayonnaise, mustard and brown sauce. The oozing condiments leak into a bucket placed below this hoisted pack and the artist, gagging and shaking, ingests this readymade burger sauce before repeating the whole process five times.

I’ve always had a strong stomach, but this tested me. A piece of art that could induce nausea to this degree definitely deserves a mention. I will take my hat off to anyone who could sit through the full 47 minutes.

For Yussef’s website Click [**HERE**](http://yussefhu.com/Resting-on-a-Sharp-Point).

The documented performance will be on at the **Slade BA/BFA Degree Show** until the 23rd May.

For more information Click [**HERE**](http://www.ucl.ac.uk/slade/degree2013/).
